get.summary: Fetches WordList objects for the logged-in user.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

200.description: Usage statistics for the supplied API key

get.summary: Given a word as a string, returns the WordObject that represents it

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: String value of WordObject to return

parameters.name: useCanonical
parameters.description: If true will try to return the correct word root ('cats' -> 'cat'). If false returns exactly what was requested.

parameters.name: includeSuggestions
parameters.description: Return suggestions (for correct spelling, case variants, etc.)

200.description: Usage statistics for the supplied API key

get.summary: Fetches audio metadata for a word.
get.description: The metadata includes a time-expiring fileUrl which allows reading the audio file directly from the API.  Currently only audio pronunciations from the American Heritage Dictionary in mp3 format are supported.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: String value of WordObject to return

parameters.name: useCanonical
parameters.description: If true will try to return the correct word root ('cats' -> 'cat'). If false returns exactly what was requested.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

200.description: Usage statistics for the supplied API key

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: String value of WordObject to return

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

parameters.name: sourceDictionaries
parameters.description: Source dictionary to return definitions from.  If 'all' is received, results are returned from all sources. If multiple values are received (e.g. 'century,wiktionary'), results are returned from the first specified dictionary that has definitions. If left blank, results are returned from the first dictionary that has definitions. By default, dictionaries are searched in this order: ahd, wiktionary, webster, century, wordnet

parameters.name: useCanonical
parameters.description: If true will try to return the correct word root ('cats' -> 'cat'). If false returns exactly what was requested.

parameters.name: includeTags
parameters.description: Return a closed set of XML tags in response

200.description: Usage statistics for the supplied API key

get.summary: Returns syllable information for a word

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: String value of WordObject to return

parameters.name: useCanonical
parameters.description: If true will try to return the correct word root ('cats' -> 'cat'). If false returns exactly what was requested.

parameters.name: sourceDictionary
parameters.description: Get from a single dictionary. Valid options: ahd, century, wiktionary, webster, and wordnet.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

parameters.description: Restrict to the supplied relationship types
